column5: BECOME A ‘DESIGNEER’ AND ENRICH PEOPLE’S LIVES WITH NEW AND/OR BETTER PRODUCTS WHILE CONTINUOUSLY IMPROVING THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESSES INVOLVED.In your daily life, without realising, you are continuously surrounded by products. But who designed these products? Why are they shaped the way they are? What user demands do they meet, what processes lie behind the development and what technologies are involved in that process? That’s what the Master’s in Industrial Design Engineering (IDE) at the University of Twente (UT) is all about.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
